Posts.Content: hello. iam 33 years old  2 1/2 weeks ago i was informed  that i have aml. very scary...... i didnt even no i had it just went to the hospital with my foot swollen and nose bleeds and by 7am they had started alot of different blood work then they did a bone marrow sample which we waited over the weekend by that monday they had to do another cause the doctor said that they were unable to get any marrow so the sec. time  there were able to confirm that its aml so the that wednesday they started me on chemo for seven days. so now iam day seven after chemo and it rough. my white blood cells are 0.3. so my question is my face and eyes are pretty swollen the doctor said that it bacterial acne, and my lips are swoolen aswell. has anyone ever had this happen to them after chemo
Posts.Title: aml
